name: sap-rpt-1-mcp
description: MCP server for SAP-RPT-1 prediction API

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = './build/index.js'; let content = fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8'); if (!content.startsWith('#!')) { fs.writeFileSync(path, '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + content); fs.chmodSync(path, '755'); }"
